A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I’ll give it 1 star out of respect for the Star Wars franchise...which is more respect then Johnson gave Luke Skywalker. Just a horrible movie on many levels. There are numerous points in this movie that made no sense. The Rose/Fin adventure was completely pointless. Phasma was useless. Purple hair girl was a terrible leader. Rebels made one bad decision after another and this movie destroyed the entire point of Episodes 4-6. Not to mention the pacing was just bad...really bad.
